code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant D as Developer
    participant CMS as Combined Module (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)

    D->>CMS: Initiate Code Generation Request
    Note over CMS: Process Code Generation
    CMS-->>D: Deliver Generated Code

    D->>CMS: Submit Generated Code for Review
    CMS->>CMS: Perform Error Analysis
    Note over CMS: Analyze and Detect Errors

    CMS->>CMS: Self-Monitor System Performance
    Note over CMS: Monitor and Optimize Performance
    
    CMS->>CMS: Apply Self-Healing and Bias Reduction
    Note over CMS: Continuous Self-Optimization

    CMS-->>D: Provide Feedback and Optimized Code
    Note over D: Review and Use Optimized Code
repo_description: GRYPHGEN: Grid Resource Prioritization in Heterogeneous Environments

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 首先，我们需要定义流程的起点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，Developer、Combined Module (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: Initiate Code Generation Request、Submit Generated Code for Review主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Initiate Code Generation Request、Submit Generated Code for Review应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Initiate Code Generation Request、Submit Generated Code for Review应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将Self-Monitor System Performance、Apply Self-Healing and Bias Reduction分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在Self-Monitor System Performance、Apply Self-Healing and Bias Reduction完成整个流程。
